blog.name: kirishi-manly
blog.title: Kirishima Eijiro
blog.description: UA Class 1A - Up and coming Hero, 🔴Red Riot 💪🏻

body:
Bakugo Fanon or Canon

Let’s play a game, Boku No Hero Academia Hero fanon or Canon (p.1) Here are a couple things I’m genuinely not sure if they’re headcanon or canon.

- Katsuki’s mom being a fashion designer or hairstylist ?

- Bakugo and Kirishima go on hikes together ?

- Bakugo and Kirishima hang out and study in each other’s rooms ?

- Kirishima and Bakugo spar ?

- Bakugo’s Hero name is Ground Zero ?

- Bakugo is still an All Might fan like he was as a child ?

- Kirishima and Bakugo’s dorm rooms are next to eachother ?

- Bakugo and Uraraka get along ?

- Bakusquad ?

- Kiminari being the only person besides Deku “allowed” to call him Kacchan ?

- Deaf Bakugo ?

- Mina or Ochako (or both) being Bakugo’s bros ?

- Bakugo being a good cook ?

- Bakugo not being able to discern emotions, emotionally constipated

-Bakugo being bad with physical contact

-(off of the previous two) Bakugo maybe has Aspergers ?


Lol I genuinely can’t remember fanon vs canon cause I’ve read too mcuh good fanfic. Please help?

blog.name: ao3feed-shigadabi
blog.title: AO3 feed for Shigaraki Tomura x Dabi
blog.description: Using an IFTTT server to post the feed here.

title: Illegitimate
body:
by SaltywithSarcasm

“On one hand, it makes sense; he’s a fucking hero but on another…” Dabi finally turns to look at the other villain, giving him a glare before the other can even finish his sentence and sees the twisted grin on his face. “You do kind of resemble that son of his, what was his name? Ah, yes. Todoroki Shouto-“

Words: 956, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Todoroki Shouto, Todoroki Enji | Endeavor, Only mentioned, Kurogiri (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Dabi/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko
  • Additional Tags: Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Angst and Feels, Dysfunctional Family, Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, shigaraki doesn’t know how to properly comfort someone, Tumblr Ask Box Fic

blog.description: Welcome to my trash bin of a blog. Eyyyy.

summary: I've been having this reoccurring thought about the Shigaraki Soulmate AU I wrote. It's basically wondering how things would...
body: I’ve been having this reoccurring thought about the Shigaraki Soulmate AU I wrote. It’s basically wondering how things would play out for them if Shigaraki was redeemed and became a part of society. I’m just not sure if anyone would want to read a version of the short story that ends that way.

reblog.comment: I’ve been having this reoccurring thought about the Shigaraki Soulmate AU I wrote. It’s basically wondering how things would play out for them if Shigaraki was redeemed and became a part of society. I’m just not sure if anyone would want to read a version of the short story that ends that way.

blog.name: quirky-hero-imagines
blog.title: BNHA Imagines
blog.description:
Heyo! Another imagines and writing BNHA blog because there can never be enough💕 INBOX IS CLOSED [33]

Masterlist

FAQ Rules

summary: Hello! Can I please have a hc or scenario (whichever is best) of Todoroki, Midoriya and Bakugo’s (separately) s/o who took a big...
question: Hello! Can I please have a hc or scenario (whichever is best) of Todoroki, Midoriya and Bakugo’s (separately) s/o who took a big hit for them against a villain? Like, their reaction? Love your works!
answer:
Thank you for sending a request and for the compliment ❤️

I’m sorry if this got too angsty!


Todoroki Shoto

As Todoroki sat next your hospital bed the events of that day kept on playing in his head.

The absolute horror that had washed over him as he saw your body hit the ground, blood pooling from the wound on your head after it had received a hard blow from the villain, how he had stood there motionlessly. Everything had felt like a nightmare.

Tears well up in his eyes as he looks at you, your beautiful h/c hair crowning around your face while you laid there motionlessly. The bandage wrapped around the top of your head had not turned bloody anymore for the past hour and Todoroki took that as a good sign.

He held your hand in his, hoping that you would wake up soon.

-

You groan softly, immediately catching Todoroki’s attention. “S-Shoto.” You choke out as he studies your face.

A weak smile forms on your face and the tears finally escape Todoroki’s eyes. He lays his face in your neck and holds the sides of your face in his hands, sobbing softly into your hair.


Katsuki Bakugou

A villain ran towards Bakugou and your body had moved without thinking, throwing him to the ground behind you.

You had let out a blood curdling scream, the claws of one of the villains had dug their way deep into your leg.

Bakugou had immediately ripped him straight off of you but it was too late, your leg bleeding profusely as your flesh was ripped to shreds. “Get her out of here.” He had desperately screamed at another pro hero.

To his relief they had listened and carried you off just as you fell unconscious from the blood loss.

After losing sight of you Bakugou had given the villain no mercy.

-

The villain had been turned in with some ‘accidental’ major injuries and Bakugou quickly made his way to the hospital which you were brought to.

“What room is y/n l/n in?!” He had yelled at one of the nurses and she had quickly brought him to your room.

Bakugou felt his legs shaking as he opened the door to your hospital room. His heart slowed down and then immediately sped back up as he saw you sitting up in your hospital bed. You smiled at him and reached out your hands, he quickly moved in and hugged you tightly. “Don’t ever do something like that again, you hear me?!” His voice broke a little and you nodded your head.


Midoriya Izuku

Midoriya tried his best to protect you during the fight, not wanting you to get hurt even a bit, but this caused him to instead be in your way.

He had bumped against you, making him lose balance. You had jumped in front of him as the villain lunged at him.

The villain made quick work out of it as he took your arms and twisted them with his insane strength, throwing you to the ground afterwards.

You had wailed in pain and even though Midoriya finished the fight quickly it had felt like hours for you.

Afterwards Midoriya had carried you to the hospital, going as fast as his legs allowed him to.

He felt anxious as he had to wait outside of the room while they healed you.

When he was finally allowed inside he froze at the sight of you. You were laying on your back, both arms tightly bandaged up.

Midoriya moved closer to you and you looked at him, eyes squinted.

“I’m so sorry y/n.” He says and sits next to your bed. You shake your head slightly. “Don’t be, I’m your hero aren’t I?” The corners of your mouth curl up and Midoriya feels his heart warm up again.

reblog.comment:
Thank you for sending a request and for the compliment ❤️

I’m sorry if this got too angsty!

A villain ran towards Bakugou and your body had moved without thinking, throwing him to the ground behind you.

You had let out a blood curdling scream, the claws of one of the villains had dug their way deep into your leg.

Bakugou had immediately ripped him straight off of you but it was too late, your leg bleeding profusely as your flesh was ripped to shreds. “Get her out of here.” He had desperately screamed at another pro hero.

To his relief they had listened and carried you off just as you fell unconscious from the blood loss.

After losing sight of you Bakugou had given the villain no mercy.

-

The villain had been turned in with some ‘accidental’ major injuries and Bakugou quickly made his way to the hospital which you were brought to.

“What room is y/n l/n in?!” He had yelled at one of the nurses and she had quickly brought him to your room.

Bakugou felt his legs shaking as he opened the door to your hospital room. His heart slowed down and then immediately sped back up as he saw you sitting up in your hospital bed. You smiled at him and reached out your hands, he quickly moved in and hugged you tightly. “Don’t ever do something like that again, you hear me?!” His voice broke a little and you nodded your head.


Midoriya Izuku

Midoriya tried his best to protect you during the fight, not wanting you to get hurt even a bit, but this caused him to instead be in your way.

He had bumped against you, making him lose balance. You had jumped in front of him as the villain lunged at him.

The villain made quick work out of it as he took your arms and twisted them with his insane strength, throwing you to the ground afterwards.

You had wailed in pain and even though Midoriya finished the fight quickly it had felt like hours for you.

Afterwards Midoriya had carried you to the hospital, going as fast as his legs allowed him to.

He felt anxious as he had to wait outside of the room while they healed you.

When he was finally allowed inside he froze at the sight of you. You were laying on your back, both arms tightly bandaged up.

Midoriya moved closer to you and you looked at him, eyes squinted.

“I’m so sorry y/n.” He says and sits next to your bed. You shake your head slightly. “Don’t be, I’m your hero aren’t I?” The corners of your mouth curl up and Midoriya feels his heart warm up again.

tags: horikoshi's writing is a lot of things but i will play devils advocate for this instance
summary: Even tho im fed up with bnha's revolting writing i just want to say thats its absolutely disgusting of horikoshi to only view...
question: Even tho im fed up with bnha's revolting writing i just want to say thats its absolutely disgusting of horikoshi to only view women as equals and professionals when it comes to hitting them.
answer:
i totally agree if it were any other context.

but given that this cast of characters are in a series where they attend a school to train to become crime fighters, and all know they will inevitably be in fisticuffs with a villain at any point of their hero careers, i think it made sense that the bakugou vs. uraraka fight chapter had that message delivered that way.

(im not caught up with the manga so i can only assume this is the scene you are referring to)

((also this is a mineta focused blog. if you want bakugou discourse, either find it elsewhere or make your own blog))
